nodes.text: Ghosts got you spooked, eh?
I would prefer not be reminded how I almost joined their ranks, thank you very much.

options.text: Say Something Polite to Lift Joel's spirits

nodes.text: It must have been terrifying being trapped in the catacombs. I'm amazed that you had the courage to survive as long as you did.
You think that I am brave even though I admit that I am afraid of ghosts?
Fear is just nature's way of telling us we're doing something really dangerous and stupid. It's smart to be afraid.
Well, for you, that was really brave.

options.text: Say Something Clever to Divert Joel

nodes.text: I don't blame you for being nervous around ghosts. They are an unpleasant reminder that death lurks behind every corner.
On the other hand, they remind us that life is short, so don't waste it with jerks like Sosi.
You make a good point, Shawn. I will be avoiding Caesari from now on.
Life may be much shorter than any of us expect.

options.text: Say Something Snarky to Amuse Joel

nodes.text: It only ghost to show you that in a ghouling wraith to escape, Sosi will crypt you and then vanish. With fiends like Sosi, who needs enemies?
Heh, heh... you are right, Shawn. Caesari is scarier than any of the ghosts here in the castle.
What I endured is not a joke, Shawn. Do not make light of it.
Nice day if it doesn't rain...
How are you feeling today?
I am still a little shaky but I am getting better, thanks.

options.text: Ask About the Nights of the Dead

nodes.text: So I guess you aren't celebrating the Nights of the Dead?
No. I prefer to stay as far away from the ghosts as possible. That is why there is no Poobah game tonight. No one wants to play while ghosts are around.
Makes sense. Besides, ghosts cheat.
What do you mean?
They've cheated death, haven't they?
Heh heh.
<groan>
Anything new for sale today?
Today, I have some very special gloves for sale - Underglovers. They improve your grip so you will get better results with your Rogue tools.
Heard anything interesting lately?
There is a story going round that the ghosts of this castle protect it from some great Evil. I, for one, am not going around talking to ghosts to find out whether the rumor is true.
So long and don't let the Spooks spook you too much.
I'll try not to.
